### Tender Description

Defence Construction Canada invites consulting firms to submit Abbreviated Proposals for consultant services to provide professional services specific to the Department of National Defence (DND) requirements in various locations in British Columbia. The proposal is for a three-year term, with a maximum estimated value of $1,500,000.00. Commissions under the SL are expected to be between $5,000.00 and $100,000.00; the maximum value of a commission under the SL is $350,000.00.
